thread.title: India News | 'Satyamev Jayate': AAP After SC Grants Interim Bail to Kejriwal | LatestLY
thread.title_full: India News | 'Satyamev Jayate': AAP After SC Grants Interim Bail to Kejriwal | LatestLY

author: PTI
title: India News | 'Satyamev Jayate': AAP After SC Grants Interim Bail to Kejriwal | LatestLY
text:
India News | 'Satyamev Jayate': AAP After SC Grants Interim Bail to Kejriwal Get latest articles and stories on India at LatestLY. The AAP on Friday hailed the Supreme Court for granting interim bail to Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal in the excise policy scam case filed by the ED, saying "satyamev jayate" . Agency News PTI | Jul 12, 2024 11:22 AM IST A+ A- New Delhi, Jul 12 (PTI) The AAP on Friday hailed the Supreme Court for granting interim bail to Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal in the excise policy scam case filed by the ED, saying "satyamev jayate" .
Also Read | Arvind Kejriwal Granted Bail: Supreme Court Orders Delhi CM To Be Released on Interim Bail in ED Case.
Kejriwal, who is the national convenor of the AAP, however, will remain in jail as the CBI had subsequently arrested him in a corruption case related to the alleged scam.
"Satyamev Jayate (truth alone triumphs)", the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) posted on X in Hindi along with a picture of Kejriwal holding the national flag.
Also Read | Arvind Kejriwal Gets Interim Bail: Supreme Court Grants Bail to Delhi CM in Excise Policy Linked Money Laundering Case.
While granting the interim bail, the apex court said Kejriwal has suffered incarceration for over 90 days. --
(This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)
